name: The Beta Bank
description:
The Beta Bank was developed as an entry for Ludum Dare #31 and designed around the theme "Entire Game on One Screen". The player is cast as the avatar of a hacker named Hugh, and tasked with infiltrating a bank's beta to terminate a protocol called the Safeguard Sun.

Controls
WASD Keys: Movement
No Input: Duck

Low Brightness Button
The highway becomes invisible, but enemy spotlights are visible.

Medium Brightness Button
Moving platforms become visible, but enemy spotlights and stationary platforms are invisible.

High Brightness Button
The stationary platforms become visible, but enemy spotlights and moving platforms are invisible.

Muted Volume Button
Strategy Spheres will not approach you, but you can't hear the System Stream.

Low Volume Button
Strategy Spheres will approach you slowly, and you can hear the System Stream faintly.

High Volume Button
Strategy Spheres will approach you, but you can hear the System Stream.
